about.title: About
about.introduction: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about creating modern and high-performance web applications. I combine creativity and technical rigor to bring innovative ideas to life.
about.journey: My journey in web development began 2 years ago, and since September 2024, I've been continuing my learning through a work-study program. This professional immersion allows me to apply my knowledge in a real-world context and enhance my technical skills.
about.passion: I'm constantly exploring new technologies and best practices to optimize my projects and deliver the best possible user experiences.
